sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMPANT in Heraldry, a term applied to a lion, leopard, or other beast that stands on its hind-legs, and rears up his fore-feet in the posture of climbing, thus showing only half his face. It is different from salient, in which the beast seems springing forward as if making a sally.
